entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
